Hi All,
Spoke to a friend who said you should not have properties in a properties
file as gives dependence on files for test cases (makes good sense).
 
So i placed all parameters in TestCase as constants,  Contents of a file to
a string and read it via ByteArrayStream.
 
Now I need to test some MS Excel files (program uses Java POI) so I think
now really I need to refer to file as a bit big to put into a String in the
test case!
 
Are there any classes (out of the box I am not aware of) for reading
properties files in the current test case and other files like Excel?
Curios on the previous, but will keep with constants in the test case.
 
Cheers,
Darren
